name: 情绪价值
lyrics:
作词 : MULA SAKEE/THOME/TOYOKI
作曲 : MULA SAKEE/THOME/TOYOKI
编曲 : 付思遥/THOME
混音母带 : 谭玉堂
发行 : Believe Artist Service

I spent too many night on you
I spent too many cash on you
I spent too many 爱 on you
I Know 有时表达的太仓促
但是就算我们互相刺痛对方那又如何
感情这场游戏只要有爱就没有loser
Lemme kiss you when you mad
Lemme funk you when you sad
Lemme hug you when you 孤独
Lemme touch you 当你不安
Fall in love 其实很简单
最难的是tryna forget
I always pretend to be ok
其实我也需要安慰
Gimme all of you
I want more than your body
Sometimes 你的情绪比我还像artist
My luxury from 巴黎so they call me thome Paris
但是 Chérie Je t'aime是我唯一会的法语
How bout lets just stop the argue
Baby girl lemme love you
我知道有时我也会发怒
但没有情绪哪来的value
时隔三年依旧记得那个拥有你的夏日
Let's just stop fighting each other
爱情不是摆架子
TOYOKI：
我早就已经尝试过等待
她一直把我推到门外
我想我们不应该分开
跟我一起潜入深海
VVS means nothing to me
你的凭空消失到底是谁出的主意
我们在漩涡的中心像被一直困在圈里
但是我不想
我想和你站在光里
几千遍 闭上眼我被剧透
我触摸到我们好像在不同的宇宙
浪费了太多时间去争论谁错谁对
我只想带回战利品不想看到你伤痕累累
MULA SAKEE：
All these wrongs I can avoid
Think he knows he just a toy
我帮他们找到我
Getting money like 怎么唱的错
Roll my doja I'm gon blow it
Racks in Goyard when I tour
那些故事都是听说
从来没让你爱上我
She luv me or luv me not
I pull up 至少杀一圈
你不想看到那一面
面具之下的以前
She wanna get inspired by me
IM the Thunder He a lightening
Most these rappers rats or dorks
Super Saiyan Master Kong
手洗干净再上桌
Og baby IM real boss
Diamond HD Maybach 框
Been that hero I've been the voice
That boy talking not involved
That boy talking not involved
Steady playing this saxophone
Hop in I8 then go Vroom
Party's over Let's go home
感觉时间不够用 yuh
Baby can we now go home
Baby can we now go home
Baby can we now go home
I spent too many night on you
I spent too many cash on you
I spent too many 爱 on you
I Know 有时表达的太仓促
但是就算我们互相刺痛对方那又如何
感情这场游戏只要有爱就没有loser
Lemme kiss you when you mad
Lemme funk you when you sad
Lemme hug you when you 孤独
Lemme touch you 当你不安
Fall in love 其实很简单
最难的是tryna forget
I always pretend to be ok
其实我也需要安慰

收起
